price: 23. Ils y feront tourner entre eux une coupe (de vin) qui n’est la cause ni de propos futiles ni n’induit au péché.
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
